On Nov 21, 2003, at 4:27 PM, J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>
> ...and you don't mind that one failing test brings down the whole 
> suite?


Why should I mind as long as the failing test is fixed immediately?  As 
it is, one failing test brings down my whole build process anyway.  I 
consider that a good thing.

I'm not trying to be facetious.  I'm really trying to learn something 
new in all of this.

Mike
